FENUGREEK
 gr22
Legume for under-sowing with a taproot and white-yellowish, insect-friendly flowers. The entire plant has a coumarin scent, typical for Schabziger cheese. The seeds are milder when roasted or boiled and are suitable as a tea, for oil or as a spice in curries, hard cheese, bread or vegetable dishes.

FLORINA
gr04
Flower-rich undersow mixture of legumes, grasses and field wildflowers. As a partially overwintering undersow FLORINA contributes to humus formation and suppresses weeds. Spread the seed widely into the standing crop and work it in superficially with the hoe.
